solution_line_template: Jesse built three structures out of building blocks, {building_blocks_building} + {building_blocks_farmhouse} + {building_blocks_fenced_area} = <<{building_blocks_building}+{building_blocks_farmhouse}+{building_blocks_fenced_area}={total_blocks_built}>>{total_blocks_built} building blocks.

Jesse started with {total_blocks_built} + {blocks_left} leftover building blocks = <<{total_blocks_built}+{blocks_left}={total_blocks_started_with}>>{total_blocks_started_with} building blocks that Jesse had originally.
